body_html:
Right, so the problem is that the padded_shapes argument to Dataset.padded_batch() doesn't match the structure of the element. The following change should fix it:

dataset = dataset.padded_batch(params.batch_size, padded_shapes=({'sgram': [None, None, None]}, []))
body_text:
Right, so the problem is that the padded_shapes argument to Dataset.padded_batch() doesn't match the structure of the element. The following change should fix it:
dataset = dataset.padded_batch(params.batch_size, padded_shapes=({'sgram': [None, None, None]}, []))
body:
Right, so the problem is that the `padded_shapes` argument to `Dataset.padded_batch()` doesn't match the structure of the element. The following change should fix it:

```python
dataset = dataset.padded_batch(params.batch_size, padded_shapes=({'sgram': [None, None, None]}, []))
```
